events.1746: French sailor's fleet reached at the bank of Pondichery in India.
events.1755: E Braddock, British General, was mortally wounded during French & Indian War.
events.1873: Henry Albert John Gidney, greatest leader and politician, was born in Igatpuri, Maharashtra.
events.1875: The Bombay Stock Exchange, the first in India, was constructed under the shade of a large banyan tree.
events.1938: Sanjeev Kumar, famous Hindi film actor, was born.
events.1951: India's first Five Year Plan prepared and published. There was the first amendment to the Constitution and the first general elections were held.
events.1969: Sagi Lakshmi Venkatapathy Raju, cricketer (Indian slow left-armer), was born in Hyderabad.
events.1979: Janardhan Gnanoba Navle, cricketer, 2 Tests for India as WK and 1 catch, passed away.
events.1992: The government agrees to set up a Joint Parliamentary Committee to enquire into the security scam.
events.1993: Passport fees raised from Rs. 60 to Rs.300.
events.1995: 17 Indian mountaineers peaked Jogambha in the Garhwal Himalayas.
events.1996: A Delhi court summoned former Prime Minister Narsimha Rao to face trial as an accused in the Lakhubhai Pathak cheating case in which godman Chandraswami was already facing trial.
events.1999: Ashok Mitra (82), noted writer, academician and former bureaucrat, died in Calcutta.
events.2000: India clinches the inaugural Asian Cricket Council under-15 championship in Kuala Lumpur.
